system.description: You create a sturdy cottage or lodge made of material that is common in the area where the spell is cast. The floor is level, clean, and dry. The shelter has a door and two shuttered windows, and its interior is divided into two rooms. It holds eight Medium creatures and is heated or cooled. It resists flames and has a secure lock on the door.

components.materialDescription: A square chip of stone, crushed lime, and a few grains of sand. Focus: small (1 foot square) replica of the shelter.
